comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://cn.bing.com/search?q=edge%E6%B5%8F%E8%A7%88%E5%99%A8&form=ANSPH1&pqlth=4&assgl=7&sgcn=edge%E6%B5%8F%E8%A7%88%E5%99%A8&sgtpv=LT&smvpcn=0&swbcn=10&sctcn=0&ghc=0&clckatsg=1&hsmssg=0](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcn.bing.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Dedge%25E6%25B5%258F%25E8%25A7%2588%25E5%2599%25A8%26form%3DANSPH1%26pqlth%3D4%26assgl%3D7%26sgcn%3Dedge%25E6%25B5%258F%25E8%25A7%2588%25E5%2599%25A8%26sgtpv%3DLT%26smvpcn%3D0%26swbcn%3D10%26sctcn%3D0%26ghc%3D0%26clckatsg%3D1%26hsmssg%3D0) ### Comment > 我搜索edge浏览器这个关键词时网页的左上角会漏拦截，这个是广告图标和链接，打开后是https://www.pcsoft.com.cn/soft/30240065.html这个网站 ### Screenshots
